channel.title: ::pickup command
channel.description: Hi i am the owner of funscape and ive been trying to fix this command ::pickup because it just doesnt work ive coppied from other servers and nothing so this is the finaly straw so if anyone got any idea (im not asking for the command)

item.title: ::pickup command
item.dc:creator: @Dan1337 Dan1337
item.description:
@Dan1337 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type It Right ! "); }

Try that out?
[where it says “YOURNAMEHERE” put ur name on the server.]

Read full topic
